item.title: What does this mean? rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

You need to give DCdown a default value before giving it a task to do. At the top of that class you will need to add

public static int DCdown = 0;
public static boolean DCDamg = false;

Hopefully I’m right, let me know what happens next. Remember though, add those static variables outside of any methods, but inside the actual "public class Name { parenthesis.

Read full topic

item.title: What does this mean? rep++ :)
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

im trying to add special attack to d claws, that i need now is to get it to hit x4 but get this error:

.\org\model\Client.java:1221: error: cannot find symbol DCdown = 4; ^ symbol: variable DCdown location: class Client .\org\model\Client.java:1222: error: cannot find symbol DCDamg = true; ^ symbol: variable DCDamg location: class Client 2 errors Click a button to continue...

this is what i added:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

i added that under this:

if(specOn == true && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0 && GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)){//players if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount > 74){ specialAtk(true, 75, 282, 1203); getHit(3); usingSpecial = true; }

when i have added it, it looks like this:

if(specOn == true && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0 && GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1)){//players if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount > 74){ specialAtk(true, 75, 282, 1203); getHit(3); usingSpecial = true; } if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

what i do fail? rep++ if helping me

Read full topic
